title: WOOT
comment: W00T

title: Balance widget not working
comment: I've been using this app to monitor prices, miner speed, and balance monitoring for a long time. Recently  the balance monitoring widget stopped working.

Blockchain.info recently made a change to their API. This has been fixed in the latest update released today.

Cheers!

title: Amazing app
comment: I love this app and rely on it a lot. The developer is quick to answer any questions or problems and in some cases provide changes. Excellent app and I highly recommend it, very powerful and expansive in the features. The only bitcoin app you should need.

Thanks for you feedback, Ben. Could you please email me with more details? (you can do so from the About section of the app)

Due to the large number of exchanges supported, Bitcoinium will now only show Price Alerts for active widgets. They will appear in the order in which widgets were created. Would it be better to force alphabetical order?

title: Niceeee!
comment: Would suggest adding the ability to change chart and font colors and sizes, but great app!

title: Great app for Bitcoin Miners
comment: Great support, good features. Love the widgets!
Awesome app!

title: Programmer is very responsive, great feature list.
comment: I use widgets to provide at a glance bitcoin stock levels (e.g. BTC-e), and, for mining status for my miners on various pools.. Definitely worth the donation, I use it daily (several times daily, in fact! ).  Some screen formatting concerns for Nova Launcher, but great with default launcher (Nova was my choice, not this guys fault).  Optional tap on a widget to get on demand updates. New pools and updates to pool API's regularly. This app is well supported.

title: Good app
comment: Good app but I'd like to see the option of larger widgets.

title: Widgets no longer exist
comment: I bought the paid for version as kudo to developers, uninstalled free version, now the widgets are gone and can not be found in available widgets. Odd. Help?
Usually a reboot or re-install solves this. This seems to be happening more often than usual... Are you using Android 4.4 by any chance?

title: Best app out there
comment: This is an excellent tool for monitoring btc and your miners. Great widgets

title: Doesn't load charts on 4G
comment: Internet works fine, this doesn't. Waste of money.

Sorry for the inconvenience, BitcoinCharts has changed their API and will require an update. Please use the Widgets to track the prices of your favorite exchanges in the meantime. This will be fixed shortly.

Thank you for your understanding. Edit: This has been fixed in latest release

title: Well done, developer.
comment: Certainly worth the money I've spent for the 'pro' version, now if only Google would take bitcoin as a payment method....

title: Best out there
comment: Happy to purchase now that BTC Guild support was added. I've tried all the bitcoin widgets available and this is the best.

title: Best out there
comment: Best bitcoin app out there. Upgraded from free version because Dev deserves the recognition.

title: Great app, does what it's supposed to...
comment: Would love to see support for miner stats for some ltc pools

title: love your work!
comment: upgrading to support your great team. almost a one-stop app for all your mobile cryptocoin needs. can't wait to see what gets included next.

title: You got my vote
comment: So many crap app for bitcoin, this one rocks !

title: Good but sometimes wont work api issue not developer's fault
comment: Read title

title: Nice app
comment: Love the ticker. Worth the price. Add trading if you can.

title: Awesome app
comment: Michael rocks

title: Great app
comment: Great app but would be better if there were different widget sizes available. Come on, so small.

title: Sooooo sooooo good
comment: I love having four different exchanges on my desktop!  The graph is good too, for when I'm away and wondering about price movements.  I sent you a tip as well :)

title: Fantastic app
comment: No problems at all with this app.  Only thing it's missing are high/low & buy/sell graphs on the Price Graph.
